SELECT m_tracker_component.id, m_tracker_component.projectId, m_tracker_component.name, m_tracker_component.userlead, m_tracker_component.description, m_tracker_component.sAccountId, m_tracker_component.lastUpdatedTime, m_tracker_component.createdTime, m_tracker_component.status, m_tracker_component.createduser, createdUserTbl.avatarId AS createdUserAvatarId, concat(createdUserTbl.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(createdUserTbl.middlename, ''), ' ')), createdUserTbl.lastname) AS createdUserFullName, s_user.avatarId AS userLeadAvatarId, concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname) AS userLeadFullName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_tracker_bug, m_tracker_bug_related_item WHERE m_tracker_bug.id=m_tracker_bug_related_item.bugid AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.type IN ('Component') AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.typeId=m_tracker_component.id) AS numBugs, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_tracker_bug, m_tracker_bug_related_item WHERE m_tracker_bug.id=m_tracker_bug_related_item.bugid AND m_tracker_bug.status IN ('Open', 'InProgress', 'Reopenned') AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.type IN ('Component') AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.typeId=m_tracker_component.id) AS numOpenBugs, m_prj_project.name AS projectName FROM m_tracker_component LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (m_tracker_component.userlead=s_user.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user AS createdUserTbl ON (m_tracker_component.createduser=createdUserTbl.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_prj_project ON (m_tracker_component.projectId=m_prj_project.id)

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(m_prj_time_logging.logValue), 0) FROM m_tracker_component, m_tracker_bug, m_tracker_bug_related_item, m_prj_time_logging WHERE m_tracker_component.id = @{componentid} AND m_tracker_component.id = m_tracker_bug_related_item.typeId AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.type = 'Component' AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.bugid = m_tracker_bug.id AND m_prj_time_logging.typeId = m_tracker_bug.id AND m_prj_time_logging.type = 'Project-Bug' AND m_prj_time_logging.isBillable = '1'

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(m_prj_time_logging.logValue), 0) FROM m_tracker_component, m_tracker_bug, m_tracker_bug_related_item, m_prj_time_logging WHERE m_tracker_component.id = @{componentid} AND m_tracker_component.id = m_tracker_bug_related_item.typeId AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.type = 'Component' AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.bugid = m_tracker_bug.id AND m_prj_time_logging.typeId = m_tracker_bug.id AND m_prj_time_logging.type = 'Project-Bug' AND m_prj_time_logging.isBillable = '0'

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(m_tracker_bug.remainEstimate), 0) FROM m_tracker_bug, m_tracker_bug_related_item WHERE m_tracker_bug_related_item.typeId = @{componentid} AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.type = 'Component' AND m_tracker_bug_related_item.bugid = m_tracker_bug.id
